body:
> Gregory J. Ward wrote:
>> I think we all owe Peter a big round of thanks for all he has done 
>> with radiance-online over the years.  I hope it's not too long before 
>> the site is up again!
>>
> Agreed!  Thanks Peter, this list has been a very valuable resource and 
> I know I refer to the archives regularly, I'm sure many others here do 
> as well.


I agree as well, radiance-online is my top-favorite on every browser and 
the most used reference manual for Radiance since many years. Thanks for 
keeping the server up Peter!


-Iebele
___
